dmca.title: MeritEducation.com calls .net an impostor
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

The following communication is to request the immediate removal of http://www.meriteducation.net from your search engine. The aforementioned website is in blatant violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the website http://www.meriteducation.com, in it entirety.

2. The offending website is http://www.meriteducation.net. The offending website has, without permission, copied - from what we can tell - in its entirety, including website design, logos, image files, proprietary links, text and code, our website, http://www.meriteducation.com.
* Please compare the following pages:

http://www.meriteducation.com (homepage of work at issue) http://www.meriteducation.net (homepage of offending website)
* If any additional proof is needed I have taken screen shots of the offending material and can email them to you upon request.
* Again, http://www.meriteducation.net is an unauthorized carbon copy of our entire website including website design, logos, images files, propriety links, text content and code.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

A notification following the removal http://www.meriteducation.net from your search engine would be greatly appreciated.

[signed]
[private]
MeritEducation.com

[private]
Sandy, Utah 84092
Ph: [private]
Email: [private]@careeradvantage.org
P.S. Contact information for offending website: [private]@meriteducation.net.
